snippet: Fashion designers embrace the underground gender-bending aesthetic made famous by the likes of David Bowie and New York drag queens.
abstract: Fashion designers today are revisiting 1970s gender-bending glam rock aesthetic.
lead_paragraph: Fashion designers embrace the underground gender-bending aesthetic made famous by the likes of David Bowie and New York drag queens.

headline.main: The Enduring Appeal of the Flamboyant Early ’70s
